metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15169 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Action View before versions 5.2.4.4 and 6.0.3.3 there is a potentialCross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Action View's translationhelpers. Views that allow the user to control the default (not found) valueof the `t` and `translate` helpers could be susceptible to XSS attacks.When an HTML-unsafe string is passed as the default for a missingtranslation key named html or ending in _html, the default string isincorrectly marked as HTML-safe and not escaped. This is patched inversions 6.0.3.3 and 5.2.4.4. A workaround without upgrading is proposed inthe source advisory.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
